query.value: InsightsMetrics | invoke pquery_counter('grpc_server_handled_total') | extend grpcService = tostring(Labels.grpc_service) | where grpcService has_any ('etcdserverpb', 'grpc.health.v1') | extend hostName = tostring(Labels.hostName) | extend grpcCode = tostring(Labels.grpc_code) | extend grpcMethod = tostring(Labels.grpc_method) | extend grpcType = tostring(Labels.grpc_type) | summarize TotalComplete = sum(DeltaVal), TotalSuccess = sumif(DeltaVal, grpcCode in ('OK', 'Canceled')) by AgentId, Computer, Origin, SourceSystem, Type, _ResourceId, hostName, grpcService, grpcMethod | where TotalComplete > 0 | extend SuccessRate = percentage(TotalSuccess, TotalComplete) | extend FailRate = 100 - SuccessRate
